sentence.Network_en: Alas, though, exonerate Holmes as we cannot make a great writer out of him.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 可惜得很, 我们既然无法使霍姆斯成为一个伟大作家就饶了他吧.

sentence.Network_en: Nothing can exonerate her from that.
There is no reason to exonerate him from the ordinary duties of a citizen.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有理由免除他做公民应尽的义务.

list.abs: In the end Audi exonerated from any wrong doing , however the damage had been done ., 最终奥迪被免除任何错误做 , 但损害已经完成.
可证明无罪的情况 exonerating circumstances  的相关例句  1. Our circumstances have been rather exceptional.我们的情况相当特别.来自《简明英汉词典》 2. We.
exculpate culpa 罪exonerate onerous 负有法律责任的Jiangang 发表于2006-09-14 08:22:35 | 阅读全文 | | 编辑 |
...罗宾·莱特·潘robin right penn马克·鲁法罗马克 ruffalo地域:美国语言:英语《被证无罪》(the exonerated)中福建省教育厅电话文名称:被证无罪英文名称:the exonerated资源类型:dvdrip刊.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin exonerat- 'freed from a burden', from the verb exonerare, from ex- 'from' + onus, oner- 'a burden'

entry.tran: 使免于罪责;证明…无罪;宣布…无罪
entry.def: If a court, report, or person in authority exonerates someone, they officially say or show that that person is not responsible for something wrong or unpleasant that has happened.

example.ex: The official report basically exonerated everyone...
example.tran: 官方报道基本上宣布所有人无罪。

example.ex: An investigation exonerated the school from any blame.
example.tran: 一项调查证明该学校没有任何过失。

means.word_mean: 1. pronounce not guilty of criminal charges;

sentences.sentence: "The suspect was cleared of the murder charges"

auth_sentence.content: Hurst's findings had helped to exonerate more than ten people.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hurst's findings had helped to exonerate more than ten people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hurst's findings had helped to exonerate more than ten people.

auth_sentence.content: An affectionate farewell might help to exonerate him from the charge of neglect.
auth_sentence.res_content: An affectionate farewell might help to exonerate him from the charge of neglect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An affectionate farewell might help to exonerate him from the charge of neglect.

stems_affixes.word_buile: on=oner负担+us表示名词→n.义务,责任
ex出+oner负担+ate表动词→从负担中摆脱出来→无罪释放

sentences.en: The report on the accident exonerates the bus driver from any responsibility.
sentences.cn: 事故的报告认为公共汽车司机是没有任何责任的。
